General.Name: Jiangsu Nhwa Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Nhwa Pharmaceutical Co., LTD produces and sells central nervous system drugs, and cardiovascular and cerebrovascular drugs in China and internationally. The company offers drugs in the anesthesia, psychiatry, and neurological categories. It also provides APIs in the areas of central nervous system, anesthetic and sedative, and others. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Xuzhou, China.
